actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to amend the Economic Stabilization Act of 1970, to exempt stabilization of the price of agricultural commodities and certain other items from its provisions.

summary.text: Prohibits the stabilization of the price of any agricultural commodity, including livestock, or fertilizer, or petroleum or any petroleum product under the Economic Stabilization Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Economic Stabilization Act of 1970, to exempt stabilization of the price of agricultural commodities and certain other items from its provisions.
